meanings.definition: The quality or state of being pinkish in color.
meanings.sent1: The pinkishnesses of the flowers brightened up the garden.
meanings.sent2: I love the pinkishnesses of the sunset.
meanings.sent3: Her room was filled with the pinkishnesses of various decorations.
meanings.sent4: The pinkishnesses of the sky at dawn painted a beautiful picture.
meanings.sent5: The artist captured the pinkishnesses of the landscape perfectly.

meanings.definition: The pinkish hues or tones present in something.
meanings.sent1: The painting had subtle pinkishnesses that added warmth.
meanings.sent2: The pinkishnesses of the fabric made it stand out.
meanings.sent3: The cake's frosting had a delightful pinkishnesses to it.
meanings.sent4: The room was decorated with pinkishnesses that soothed the eyes.
meanings.sent5: The sunrise brought a burst of pinkishnesses to the horizon.

meanings.definition: The presence of pinkish characteristics or qualities.
meanings.sent1: The pinkishnesses of her cheeks showed her embarrassment.
meanings.sent2: The pinkishnesses of the room gave it a cozy feel.
meanings.sent3: His shirt had an unexpected pinkishnesses that made him stand out.
meanings.sent4: The garden was filled with the pinkishnesses of blooming flowers.
meanings.sent5: The toy had a playful pinkishnesses that appealed to children.
